Package Presentation.Controller.Subcontrollers

Class ContinueGameController

java.lang.Object
Presentation.Controller.Subcontrollers.ContinueGameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class ContinueGameController extends Object implements ActionListener
Used to determine what the next step is based on the input receved in the corresponding view
